Text:
177 leechers and I'm the first to say thanks?!?

Well, esp... this loyal reader will say thanks once again for all your hard work.  Keep up the great work!

HELL YESSSSSSSSSSS!!! Minutemen Rock, Espurious rocks!

Thanks! =)

Thanks everyone.

With so many sites and trackers down, it's hard to find places to upload, but check the Comic List in every torrent to find where they've been uploaded.
Thank you for doing this!  The Comic List has really helped me track down issues I couldn't find.  Awesome work.

Thanks a ton for the upload!

Keep those Star Wars comics coming... =)
